title: UX Strategy & Governance
description: Alignment, leadership support, and governance models that make UX repeatable and effective.

items.title: Is there a documented UX strategy aligned with your business and regulatory objectives?
Does leadership actively champion UX as a driver of patient/HCP engagement and compliance?
Are UX goals tied to measurable business or clinical KPIs (e.g., adherence, satisfaction, workflow efficiency)?
Is there a dedicated UX governance model (roles, decision-making, compliance reviews)?
How consistently are UX standards applied across markets, brands, or therapeutic areas?

title: Research & Understanding
description: Ways of learning from patients, caregivers and HCPs, and how insights travel across teams.

items.title: Do you regularly conduct user research with patients, caregivers, and/or HCPs to inform design decisions?
Are research findings documented and shared across teams (marketing, medical, compliance)?
How frequently are personas and journey maps updated based on new data?
Do you test content and interfaces for health literacy, accessibility, and comprehension?
Are patient and HCP insights integrated early in project planning, not post-launch?

title: Experience Design & Accessibility
description: Design standards and accessibility practices tailored for healthcare-grade experiences.

items.title: Do you have UX/UI design standards tailored for healthcare and regulatory environments?
Is your website WCAG 2.1 AA compliant, and are accessibility audits performed regularly?
Are interactive tools (e.g., dosage calculators, trial finders) designed with user safety and clarity in mind?
Is there a consistent design system used across digital touchpoints (web, apps, portals)?
Are content hierarchies and navigation tailored to different user types (HCP, patient, payer)?

title: Regulatory & Compliance Integration
description: Embedding FDA/EMA/HIPAA considerations and review partners into the UX process early.

items.title: Is there a clear process to ensure UX design complies with FDA, EMA, and HIPAA regulations?
Are legal and medical reviewers integrated into UX workflows early (not just at the end)?
Do digital assets include clear disclaimers, citations, and adverse event reporting links?
Is there a documented audit trail for UX decisions related to compliance?
Are UX designers trained in regulatory best practices for healthcare content and interfaces?

title: Measurement & Optimisation
description: Measuring engagement and closing the loop from analytics to UX improvements and outcomes.

items.title: Are UX and engagement metrics (e.g., completion rates, dwell time, task success) actively tracked?
Do you run A/B or multivariate testing to optimize conversions or engagement?
Are you collecting feedback from end-users post-launch (e.g., satisfaction surveys?)
Is there a continuous improvement loop connecting analytics → UX design → business outcomes?
Do UX insights inform future product strategy and innovation roadmaps?
